yarangi.graphics.quadraturin.events
Class UserActionEvent

java.lang.Object
  yarangi.graphics.quadraturin.events.UserActionEvent

public class UserActionEvent
extends Object

User action event represents a mouse or keyboard buttons action (press, release, tap). TODO: add keyboard special buttons as additional modifiers (Shift, CTRL, Alt, etc) Add codes for other mouse buttons.

Field Summary
private  int action
          An action id.
private  SceneEntity entity
          Entity involved in this event.
private  int inputCode
          Code of pressed button.Uses the KeyEvent.getKeyCode() values for keyboard buttons, or MOUSE_LEFT_BUTTON/MOUSE_RIGHT_BUTTON constants for mouse buttons.
private  int inputMode
          One of the(PRESSED/TAPPED/RELEASED} consts.

static int MOUSE_RIGHT_BUTTON
           
static int PRESSED
          Button pressed flag
static int RELEASED
          Button released flag
static int TAPPED
          Button tapped flag
